selections.name: My Tea
selections.reason: Standout performer with three consecutive second placings. Beaten a nose last start and draws perfectly in barrier 5 to control the race.

selections.name: Dancing Spirit
selections.reason: William Pike takes the ride on this 3yo filly. Draws soft in barrier 3 and should get a lovely run in transit.

selections.name: Pure Mac
selections.reason: Comes out of stronger Ascot races. While the barrier is tricky, the class drop to Provincial maiden is significant.

selections.name: Carentan
selections.reason: Showed improvement last start finishing 4th. Draws the rails and maps to be competitive.

danger_horse.name: Dancing Spirit
danger_horse.reason: Pike booking signals intent and the low draw makes her a major threat to the favorite.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Trifecta Key: 1 / 5,6,10 / 5,6,10. Anchor My Tea who deserves to break through.

selections.name: Unfortunate Lad
selections.reason: Posted a strong 2nd last start at Albany. Brings the best recent race form into this field.

selections.name: Leafice
selections.reason: Consistent type with two 3rd placings recently. Chris Parnham rides and draws well to sit on pace.

selections.name: Buster's Babe
selections.reason: First starter who won a trial at Lark Hill. Draws the inside gate and Brad Parnham rides.

selections.name: Acquired Taste
selections.reason: Another debutant with a trial win. Clint Johnston-Porter booking suggests readiness.

danger_horse.name: Leafice
danger_horse.reason: Race experience and consistency make her a safe option if the debutants are green.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Box Exacta 2, 6, 9. Lean on race experience but cover the trial winner from the rail.

selections.name: Can't Catch Me
selections.reason: Speedy filly drawn barrier 1. Has finished runner-up in last two starts. On-pace bias at Bunbury suits her perfectly.

selections.name: Desert Waves
selections.reason: Pike rides. Finished 2nd last start and draws barrier 2. The clear danger to the top pick.

selections.name: Dark Opal
selections.reason: Consistent form with placings in recent starts. Should be in the mix again.

selections.name: Gloranardo
selections.reason: Improved effort to finish 2nd last time out. Draws well.

danger_horse.name: Desert Waves
danger_horse.reason: Pike/Dickson combination is lethal. Will be stalking the leader from the good gate.

selections.name: Eightyseven Lad
selections.reason: William Pike rides. Put in a solid 2nd last start. Looks ready to win 3rd up.

selections.name: Wahoochino
selections.reason: Beaten a nose last start at this track. Draws the rail and Brad Parnham sticks. Huge chance.

selections.name: La Nocciola
selections.reason: Improved significantly to run 3rd last start. Draws well in barrier 4.

selections.name: Playing Free
selections.reason: Neville Parnham trained. Has been fair but finds a winnable race here.

danger_horse.name: Wahoochino
danger_horse.reason: Rail draw and last start performance suggest he will be right in the finish.

selections.name: Magic Carats
selections.reason: Very consistent with form reading 2-4-2. Draws barrier 1 and Shaun O'Donnell rides. The one to beat.

selections.name: Safedeel
selections.reason: Ran a nice 3rd last start. Chris Parnham takes the ride which is a positive lead.

selections.name: Pacific Frost
selections.reason: Resuming with William Pike aboard. Watch betting closely.

selections.name: Extreme Ruler
selections.reason: Has experience on side. Draws well and can run a place.

danger_horse.name: Safedeel
danger_horse.reason: Chris Parnham booking and improved run last start makes him a threat.

selections.name: Flavoursome
selections.reason: Had two consecutive 2nd placings before a break/poor run. Draws barrier 2 and can bounce back here.

selections.name: Diamond Choux
selections.reason: Pike rides. Ran 3rd last start. Must be respected on jockey booking alone.

selections.name: Midnight Star
selections.reason: Form is okay (5th then 2nd), but the wide barrier (14) is a major concern.

selections.name: Luna Ascending
selections.reason: Not far away in recent runs. Good barrier.

danger_horse.name: Diamond Choux
danger_horse.reason: Pike factor in a weak field.

selections.name: Buster Biff
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track. Draws perfectly in barrier 3 to repeat the dose.

selections.name: Wayne The Pain
selections.reason: Consistent type with back-to-back 2nd placings. Brad Parnham rides.

selections.name: Three Grand
selections.reason: Another last start winner. Draws well in barrier 4.

selections.name: My De Grece
selections.reason: Won maiden last start. Step up in class but has confidence.

danger_horse.name: Wayne The Pain
danger_horse.reason: Knocking on the door and maps well.

selections.name: Sentimental Legend
selections.reason: Resuming. Won impressive on debut in November. Pike takes the ride which is a huge push.

selections.name: Tidwell
selections.reason: Won maiden last start. Draws the rails. Will be in it for a long way.

selections.name: O'so Demanding
selections.reason: Consistent with two 3rd placings recently. Each way claims.

selections.name: Aurora Queen
selections.reason: Has ability but the wide draw makes it tougher.
